azurerm_mysql_database.description: Manages a MySQL Database within a MySQL Server.

name.description: Specifies the name of the MySQL Database, which needs [to be a valid MySQL identifier](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/identifiers.html). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

server_name.description: Specifies the name of the MySQL Server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the MySQL Server exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

charset.description: Specifies the Charset for the MySQL Database, which needs [to be a valid MySQL Charset](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/charset-charsets.html). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

collation.description: Specifies the Collation for the MySQL Database, which needs [to be a valid MySQL Collation](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/charset-mysql.html). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the MySQL Database.

create.description: Used when creating the MySQL Database.

update.description: Used when updating the MySQL Database.

read.description: Used when retrieving the MySQL Database.

delete.description: Used when deleting the MySQL Database.
